product_name: BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter - Fits Peg Perego Seats
long_description: Easily take your infant from car to BOB stroller with this BOB Infant car seat adapter, allowing infant to remain in the compatible Peg Perego infant car seat for ultimate convenience!
